trans-unit.target: 「蛇妖，你所有腐化之物都将付之一炬，再无他物为你亵渎。」 ～炽血秘教徒阿玛拉

trans-unit.target: 威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，你可以将CARDNAME视同具有闪现异能地来施放。（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放之。） 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+0且具有先攻异能。

Whenever CARDNAME blocks, it deals 1 damage to you.

When CARDNAME is turned face up, target creature can't block this turn.

trans-unit.source: "Do you hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? They are as fierce as the bear that fears no foe and as sly as the mink that creeps unseen. You will be as much prey as they."\n—Nitula, the Hunt Caller
trans-unit.target: 「年轻人，你在峰顶猎捕过雪怪吗？他们跟无所畏惧的熊一样凶猛，跟来去无踪的貂一样狡猾。你同样也是他们的猎物。」 ～召猎人妮图拉

trans-unit.source: "The voice calls me here, yet I see only bones. Is this more dragon trickery?"\n—Sarkhan Vol

trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
